titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, to award grants to States to implement a tick identification pilot program.
Tick Identification Pilot Program Act of 2019
Tick Identification Pilot Program Act of 2019
Tick Identification Pilot Program Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Tick Identification Pilot Program Act of 2019
This bill authorizes the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to award grants to states to implement tick-identification programs, which must allow individuals to electronically report tick incidents and receive feedback from experts as to the appropriate follow-up action.
